announcement.message: Sovryn has just lifted transaction limits (hooray!). This means you can now take any position size. Please be aware, however, since the limits were only just removed, liquidity in the system may be low initially.

hintHowToConnect.hintOne: Before you can trade and lend with Sovryn, you need to connect to the RSK network.
hintHowToConnect.hintTwo: Get instructions on how to connect with <0>Metamask</0> or <1>Nifty</1> and then connect your wallet:

serviceWorkerToaster.title: App was updated.
serviceWorkerToaster.message: New content is available and will be used when all tabs for this page are closed.

optin.title: Success
optin.text: You will now receive email notifications when your positions are close to liquidation, and if a position has been liquidated. You may opt out of these at any time

unsubscribe.title: You are now unsubscribed from email notifications
unsubscribe.text: You will no longer receive emails about margin calls or liquidated positions. You can re-subscribe to these notifications at any time.

tradingHistoryPage.auth: Please connect and authorize your wallet.

history.title: BTC Deposit History

fastBtcForm.connectWallet: To use Top-Up you need to connect your wallet with the dapp.

fastBtcForm.exchanging: We are exchanging to rBTC it now.
fastBtcForm.transfered: was transfered to your RSK walllet
fastBtcForm.disabledText: Top-up deposits have been temporarily disabled. We ask that you not send funds until re-enabled. Thank you!

liquidity.line_1: Liquidity is too low for swapping.
liquidity.line_2: Try another pair or wait for arbiters to re-balance.

footer.title: Powered by <0>Bitcoin</0>
footer.notice_1: Only you control and have access to your wealth, any actions you take could cause a potential loss of funds.
footer.notice_2: Particularly please be sure to check all transaction fee prices before proceeding as third party wallets may automatically present high fees.
footer.notice_3: Please visit our <0>FAQ</0> if you have any questions.
footer.notice_4: If you’re new to DeFi, here is the <0>wiki</0> on how to use SOVRYN.

whiteListedNotification.text: Currently Sovryn is available for invited users only and your wallet is not yet whitelisted. All interactions is disabled until you switch to whitelisted wallet or get whitelisted for current one.

limitsNotification.text: Sovryn has just lifted transaction limits (hooray!). This means you can now take any position size. Please be aware, however, since the limits were only just removed, liquidity in the system may be low initially.

rskConnectTutorial.mobile_wallet_alert_line1: Make sure to use mobile wallet that supports RSK wallet. We suggest RWallet or Defiant.
rskConnectTutorial.mobile_wallet_alert_line2: MetaMask has issues with calculating gas price for RSK network - always review if it's not to large before approving transaction!

mobileNotReady.p1: The Sovryn user experience is not yet optimized for mobile.
mobileNotReady.p2: Register your email to hear when our mobile version is ready!
mobileNotReady.p3: Until then, why not try the desktop version?
mobileNotReady.successText: We will contact you as soon as Sovryn Mobile is live.

1.title: You Are Connected!
1.p1: In order to borrow/lend and trade on Sovryn, you must first enable your Bitcoin by transferring them to your rsk wallet.
1.p2: You do this by creating a unique btc address that pegs to your RSK address, supercharging your BTC into RBTC.

2.p1: Your unique BTC address has been created, transfer BTC to receive RBTC in your RSK wallet.
2.important1: Do not deposit any non - BTC assets to this address, otherwise your assets will be lost permanently
2.important2: Please allow upto 15 mins for the transaction to process
2.contactUs: For support please join us on

approve.title: Approve Tokens
approve.description: Confirm transaction in your wallet to approve token spending in this smart-contract.

pending_for_user.title: Pending for user
pending_for_user.text: Please confirm transaction in your wallet.

confirmed.title: Transaction confirmed!
confirmed.text: Your transaction was confirmed in the blockchain.

redeem.line_1: There is not enough {{currency}} in lending pool.
redeem.line_3: Pool will increase once users will repay their loans.

borrow.line_1: There is not enough {{currency}} in lending pool to borrow.
borrow.line_3: Pool will increase once users will repay their loans.

liquidity.line_1: Liquidity is too low for closing position.
liquidity.line_2: Try another return asset or wait for arbiters to re-balance.

main.gasPriceNote: Make sure gas price does not exceed 0.06 GWEI
main.entryPriceNote: The price is taken from our AMM and as such is subject to flunctuations.

tx.pendingForUserText: Review and confirm transaction in your wallet

notifyDialog.heading: Caution… No Really
notifyDialog.acceptTerms: I have read and understand that I am responsible for my own Sovrynity

generalAlert.p1: SOVRYN is a decentralized bitcoin trading and lending platform, the first of it kind!
generalAlert.p2: Only you control and have access to your wealth, any actions you take could cause a potential loss of funds.
generalAlert.p3: Make sure to check all transaction fee prices before proceeding as third party wallets may automatically present high fees.
generalAlert.p5_1: If you’re new to DeFi, here is the

metamaskAlert.p1: We noticed you have MetaMask installed.
metamaskAlert.p2_1: There are known issues when using MetaMask with SOVRYN. We suggest using a browser wallet like
metamaskAlert.p2_5: . If you wish to continue with MetaMask please be aware of the following known errors:

defaultGasPrice.title: High default gas price
defaultGasPrice.description: set your gas price manually to 0.06 GWEI

checksum.title: ETH checksum instead of RSK checksum
checksum.description: use lower case addresses as receiver for manual transactions

price.title: Shows price as ETH instead of (r)BTC
price.description: currently we suggest checking your token balances in the SOVRYN My Wallet section.

fastBtcDialog.title: Top Up FastBTC
fastBtcDialog.subtitle: Deposit BTC to receive rBTC in your wallet

instructions.title: Instructions:
instructions.point1: Do not deposit anything other than BTC
instructions.point2: Do not send more BTC than the MAX limit
instructions.point3: Allow  15 mins for the transaction to process
